scripts.build:static: mkdir -p dist/css dist/js dist/img/manifest && cp src/index.html dist/ && cp src/favicon.ico dist/ && cp src/sw.js dist/ && cp src/site.webmanifest dist/ && cp -r src/img/* dist/img/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:static && npm run build:js && npm run build:css
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run build:static && npm run build:js && npm run build:css && (npm run dev:static & npm run dev:js & npm run dev:css & npm run dev:serve)
